While cleaning out the attic of their late grandfather's Defiance, Ohio house,...
...Karl Kissner and Karla Hench unknowingly made the dream...
...of baseball card collectors everywhere come to life.
While Kissner was cleaning out the attic with his cousin Hench,...
...the two stumbled on a soot-covered cardboard box...
...that have been valued at up to three million dollars,...
...a discovery some experts are calling the most incredible find...
